Job Description: JOB PURPOSE AND IMPACT   The Application Support Analyst II will maintain, integrate and implement software applications within our organization. We seek a professional to coordinate software application testing, quality assurance, configuration, installation and support to ensure smooth, stable and timely implementation of new software and updates to installed applications.  KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES   Develop and recommend improvements to standard and moderately complex application support processes and procedures.   Review, analyze and prioritize incoming incident tickets and/or user requests.   Perform programming, configuration, testing and deployment of fixes or updates for application version releases.   Keep an open channel of communication with users and respond to standard and moderately complex application support requests and needs.   Independently solve moderately complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff.   Other duties as assigned   MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS   Bachelor?s degree in a related field or equivalent experience   Minimum of two years of related work experience   Other minimum qualifications may apply
